name: Acamas Ventures Holding Limited
description: Developer of a social payment system designed to serve enterprise and individual accounts. The company's mobile payment platform offers financial services in partnership with established financial institutions and technology companies and provides multi-currency account and card, remittance, instant, and free money transfer services in addition to other value-added services, empowering users with easy access to bank accounts and financial services.
one_liner: Developer of a social payment system designed to serve enterprise and individual accounts. The company's mobile payment platform offers financial services in partnership with established financial institutions and technology companies and provides multi-currency account and card, remittance, instant, and free money transfer services in addition to other value-added services, empowering users with easy access to bank accounts and financial services.
